Articles.Content:
Hello, I have found an easy way to get to the Mun. You must time warp until the Mun is in the position in the picture.

http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/3306/screenshot4ex.png

Once it is there, Burn non-stop and wait until it says 'Mun Encounter'. That is how I get on the Mun. So far I have gotten two rovers on the Mun, and two pods. Please reply if this works for you. I hope it works!
And what about the landing part? After all, the subject of this thread is 'Easy Mun Landing.'

It\'s also fairly hard to tell what you\'re illustrating. We can\'t tell what the configuration of Kerbin is at launch; there are too many sats in the way

Are you advocating a direct-ascent flight to the Mun? How fast is the spacecraft you\'re using? Screenshotting out the whole process would be extremely illustrative.
I think he is advocating a direct ascent. The picture is supposed to be looking at Kerbin from above the launch site.
I am looking at Kerbin from above, and yes I fly straight up. I have modifed my fuel tanks a bit also. Sorry I didn\'t put enough info. I will try to get some more screenshots.
This is kind of random, but, does anyone notice how his Kerbin looks like a atom, with all those missions in orbit?
